briefTitle: "Efficacy and Safety of Brimonidine Tartrate Preservative-Free Formulation in Adults With Ocular Redness"

armGroups.label: Brimonidine tartrate preservation-free
interventionNames: Drug: Brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.025% preservative-free formulation

interventions.name: Brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.025% preservative-free formulation

outcomeMeasures.title: Ocular Redness
outcomeMeasures.description: Ocular redness score evaluated by the investigator from 5 minutes to 240 minutes after investigational drug instillation (0-4 unit scale, where 0 = None and 4 = Extremely severe).
